title: SOLD: Polar Bear "missing IE" Doolan, Bergen
author: Rob D.

posts.post_title: SOLD: Polar Bear "missing IE" Doolan, Bergen
posts.post_content:
"I guess the good cards sell fast."

(And thanks for all of the emails!) 

Doolan, $x,xxx delivered

Bergen, $x,xxx delivered

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ineedanap/otherphotos/pb-ie_1.jpg[/IMG]
give it up.....there is only one johnny v;):D

I was expecting this from someone.:D
All my PB (both) have all the letters....and are pretty much worthless. I might soak them and see if the letters fall off.
Great find here.

Impossible front/back combo and price reduction in the same post. I think someone owns the copyright to that, I take it you are paying for the use of 
that successful marketing tool.

[quote name="Mikehealer" post=1394928]Impossible front/back combo and price reduction in the same post. I think someone owns the copyright to that, I take it you are paying for the use of 
that successful marketing tool.[/QUOTE]

"Thanks for all of the emails."
I'll bet they take weeks to sort through.
Damnit.  I was just going to ask if by saying that you actually own the cards you meant you would be willing to buy them after you found a seller for a higher price?

If the letters are missing, how can you be sure they are an "i" and an "e".

These could be rarer than you think.;)

[quote name="frankbmd" post=1395052]If the letters are missing, how can you be sure they are an "i" and an "e".

These could be rarer than you think.;)[/QUOTE]

That's where they got the last two letters for the Sherry Magee error card Frank!

[quote name="mrvster" post=1394852]give it up.....there is only one johnny v;):D[/QUOTE]

That's right! There is only one Johhny V....The original King of Scraps!

you were and are and always will be ahead of your time

:)

thank you my friend

[quote name="frankbmd" post=1395052]If the letters are missing, how can you be sure they are an "i" and an "e".

These could be rarer than you think.;)[/QUOTE]

Lol.  Can always rely on you Frank.

and smart response wolf!
